class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.table.FunctionalStepParameter
class.comment: Contains defined parameters available for functional steps.

column.name: FUNCTIONAL_STEP_ID
column.comment: The type of step identifier and foreign key to the FUNCTIONAL_STEP table.

column.name: MANDATORY
column.comment: Set to "1" if this parameter must have a value.

column.name: PARAMETER_TYPE
column.comment: The type of parameter: B - boolean, S - string, I - integer, R - real number.

column.name: DISCRETE_VALUES
column.comment: Any list of values that this parameter is limited to. Each value is separated by a pipe character (|).

column.name: DEFAULT_VALUE
column.comment: An entry here will be the default parameter value.

column.name: FUNCTIONAL_STEP_PARAMETER_ID
column.comment: The functional step parameter identifier. Part of the primary key and foreign key to the FUNCTIONAL_STEP_PARAMETER table.
